name: Deal of 2 Toffee Three Milk Cake
des: Our Three milk cake is loved by all, the trio of milk soaked in makes it the perfect treat for you

name: Deal of 4 Packs of Chocolate Chip biscuit
des: Chips ahoy! A classic chocolate biscuit with loads of chocolate chips on top; perfect for tea time or even a midday craving.

name: Deal of 4 Butterscotch Blondies
des: Oh so chewy and caramelly! Our Butterscotch Blondies have a deliciously caramel texture and flavor that comes from our homemade butterscotch scattered generously throughout the batter and the topping of caramel sauce.

name: Deal of 2 Cheese Pizza
des: Say yes, please to cheese! Our Cheese Pizza is the perfect combination of soft yet crispy pizza crust, freshly made tomato and herb pizza sauce and delicious cheese. Sure to satisfy all your cheesy cravings and it is the perfect size for snacking or for a tea party.

name: Deal of 4 Tandoori Chicken Cheese Patties
des: Cheesy classics! Our Chicken Cheese Patties have a spicy chicken and cheese filling in buttery puff pastry squares.

name: Deal of 2 Double Fudge Brownie
des: Could chocolate get any more intense! Our Double Fudge Brownie combines a classic brownie sponge with chocolate fudge sauce which is then marbled with rows of white chocolate.
